means: 玩笑，恶作剧( prank的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Frank's errancy consisted mostly of pranks.
sentence.Network_cn: 法兰克错在老喜欢恶作剧.

sentence.Network_en: He always leads in pranks and capers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他老是带头胡闹和开玩笑.

sentence.Network_en: Children like to play pranks on people.
sentence.Network_cn: 小孩子喜欢跟人恶作剧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: full of pranks they were , stealing apples from the orchards , climbing the haystacks , hanging the village washing on the treetops .四个人个个都是搞恶作剧的能手。他们从果园里偷苹果，爬干草垛，把村民们晾晒的衣服挂到树梢上。
you always lecture me like you're my grandfather or something . but I'm not the brat who used to pull pranks all the time !你总是像我祖父似的给我说教。但是我已经不是那个总是做恶作剧的乳臭未干的小孩了！
Dodo says pranks can also potentially alienate or hurt someone's feelings if not in good taste .多多称，如果恶作剧的方式不得当，还有可能疏远或伤害别人的感情。
with Betty's poor dress sense and ugliness , she becomes the laughing stock of the company , as well as a target for mean pranks and nasty jokes .因为穿衣服没品以及“丑陋”，贝蒂成了全公司的笑柄以及各种恶作剧和下流笑话的攻击对象。

list.abs: My older Brother put me up to making a prank telephone call ., 我大哥让我打了一个恶作剧的电话.

he added April Fool's Day deadline could be an attempt to misdirect the attention of security professionals and computer users – or that the activation date could even indicate a prank .他补充说愚人节这个日期可能只是要误导安全专家和计算机用户的注意力-这个预定的发作日期只是个恶作剧。
